entry.name: MsgOpenWorkspace
entry.comment: Message box description

area.entry: Please verify that Groove is running.
Before you can put a member on the canvas, the member must be added to your personal contacts. Do you want to add this member to your personal contacts?
Could not add member to personal contacts
The user is already in the personal contacts list
The contact {0} is not in the personal contacts list so you can not start a chat session. Please add the contact to your personal contact list using Groove and verify that Groove is running.

entry.name: capFilterOutName
entry.comment: Default text in the input field in the Message Center user dialog. 'member' just means a person that is automatically listed as online or offline in a type of chat list.
